name: We Need To Go Deeper (itch) (grzykiel)
description:
Made for LD48 "deeper and deeper".

Instructions

Arrows to move

Space to shoot

Description

An action platformer using Nolan-esque timeframes. As you descend levels, the upper levels move slower. Enemies can 'kick' you back to the previous level if they reach the door.

Character sprites by penusbmic
